subject: RE: [junit] Errors moving to 1.5
msgSnippet: Has anyone else used JUnit with Java 1.5?  I am curious whether anyone else has, whether you have encountered problems or not, and have you used JUnit to test
messageBody:
Has anyone else used JUnit with Java 1.5? I am curious whether anyone
else has, whether you have encountered problems or not, and have you
used JUnit to test classes that use new Java 1.5 features such as
parameterization?

Thanks,
Matthew Metlis

-----Original Message-----
From: J. B. Rainsberger [mailto:jbrains@...]
Sent: Friday, February 04, 2005 10:52 AM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [junit] Errors moving to 1.5


Metlis, Matthew B. wrote:
>
> Hi, thank you for your suggestion. I work with David on the
project
> where we moved to Java 1.5. I downloaded JUnit and built it
from the
> source with 1.5. First, compiling JUnit with Java 1.5 does
not solve
> the problems David reports below.

Hm. In that case, I don't know what to suggest. You're out of my
area of
expertise.

I hope someone else can help you.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
